title: State Event
description: In addition to the Room Event fields, State Events have the following additional fields.

state_key.description: A unique key which defines the overwriting semantics for this piece of room state. This value is often a zero-length string. The presence of this key makes this event a State Event.

prev_content.description: Optional. The previous ``content`` for this event. If there is no previous content, this key will be missing.
